properties.title: Compatibility Level
properties.description: It is the integer value being used by Client (Genie) for the Compatibility information of Content.

properties.title: Min Supported Version
properties.description: Minimum Supported Version of this content

properties.title: Visibility
properties.description: Visibility (set as 'Parent' to hide this from any other list view)

properties.title: Audience
properties.description: The target audience of the Content

properties.title: Mime Type
properties.description: Mime Type of the Content. E.g: application/pdf

properties.title: Media Type
properties.description: Media Type. e.g: image, pdf, etc

properties.title: Package Version
properties.description: Version number of the package file

properties.title: Semantic Version
properties.description: Semantic version number of the package file

properties.title: Data Version Key
properties.description: Version number data in Content Node

properties.title: Streaming Url
properties.description: Stream url of the video content

properties.title: Objects Used in the Content
properties.description: List of Objects Used in the Content

properties.title: Curriculum (Board)
properties.description: Education Board (Like MP Board, NCERT, etc)

properties.title: Subject
properties.description: Subject of the Content to use to teach

properties.title: Medium
properties.description: Medium of instruction. e.g: English, Hindi etc

properties.title: Page Number
properties.description: Page number of Textbook which the Content belongs to.

properties.title: Publisher
properties.description: Publisher of the content (e.g. Pratham Books)

properties.title: Grade Level
properties.description: Grade Level for which content is created

properties.title: Content Type
properties.description: Content Type. e.g: TextBook, Resource, etc

properties.title: Resource Type
properties.description: Resource Type. e.g: Learn, Teach, Play

properties.title: Genre
properties.description: Genre. e.g: Picture Books, Fiction, etc

properties.title: Theme
properties.description: Theme. e.g: Nature, Art, Music, etc

properties.title: Draft Image Copy Identifier
properties.description: The Identifier of the draftImage Copy which is of Object Type 'ContentImage', Technically it is Shadow Copy of Content Object to Edit without making the 'Live' Content to Draft.

properties.title: Feedback
properties.description: Type of Feedback. e.g: Audio, Textual, etc

properties.title: Teaching Mode
properties.description: Teaching Mode. e.g: Concrete, Pictorial, etc

properties.title: Skills Required
properties.description: Skills Required. e.g: Listening, Reading, Writing, etc

properties.title: Status
properties.description: Status of the content. e.g: Draft, Live

properties.title: Dial Codes for Content
properties.description: Array of DialCodes Linked to Content

properties.title: Optimization Status
properties.description: Optimization Status. e.g: Pending, Processing, etc

properties.title: Checksum
properties.description: Checksum value of the story package file

properties.title: Created By
properties.description: ID of the user who created Content

properties.title: Name of the user who created Content
Name of the user who did the final review and published the content
Created On
properties.description: The date on which content got created

properties.title: Last Updated By
properties.description: Name of User who modified the content at last

properties.title: Last Updated On
properties.description: date on which content got modified at last

properties.title: Submitted for Review By
properties.description: Name of the User Who submitted the content for Review

properties.title: Submitted for Review On
properties.description: Date on which content submitted for Review

properties.title: Published By
properties.description: Name of the User who Published Content

properties.title: Published On
properties.description: Date on which content got Published

properties.title: Total Sessions
properties.description: Total sessions count of this content by learners

properties.title: Creation Sessions
properties.description: Creation sessions count of this content by learners

properties.title: Creation Timespent
properties.description: Creation timespent of this content by learners

properties.title: Total Time Spent
properties.description: Total time spent by learners on this content

properties.title: Total Interactions
properties.description: Total number of interactions by learners while using this content

properties.title: Average Interactions/min
properties.description: Average number of interactions per minute

properties.title: Average Sessions/device
properties.description: Average Number of sessions per device

properties.title: Total Devices
properties.description: Total number of devices on which the content is played

properties.title: Average Rating
properties.description: Overall average rating of the content

properties.title: Total Downloads
properties.description: Total number of downloads of this content on device

properties.title: Total Sideloads
properties.description: Total number of sideloads of this content on device

properties.title: Total Ratings
properties.description: Total number of ratings given for this content

properties.title: Total Ratings Count
properties.description: Total number of ratings count given for this content

properties.title: Total Comments
properties.description: Total number of comments given for this content

properties.title: Total Usage Count
properties.description: Total number of usages of this content in other content

properties.title: Total Live Content Usage
properties.description: Total number of usages of this content in other Live content

properties.title: Total Usages in last week
properties.description: Total number of usages of this content in the last one week

properties.title: Total Deletions in last week
properties.description: Total number of times this content is removed from a content

properties.title: Last used timestamp
properties.description: Date/time when this content was last used

properties.title: Last time when content is removed
properties.description: Date/time when this content was last removed from a content

properties.title: Total DialCode Attached
properties.description: Total Number of DialCode Attached with the content

properties.title: Total DialCode Linked
properties.description: Total Number of DialCode Linked with the content

properties.title: Flagged By
properties.description: Name of User who flagged the content

properties.title: Last Flagged On
properties.description: Date/time when the content was Flagged

properties.title: Type of Copy i.e. the purpose of Copy from the original Content e.g. Copied for Translation, Improvisation, etc
properties.description: Type of Copy i.e. the purpose of Copy from the original Content e.g. Copied for Translation, Improvisation, etc

properties.title: Reject Reasons
properties.description: List of Reasons for Content Rejection

properties.title: Reserved Dialcodes
properties.description: List of reserved dialcodes for the content

properties.title: Dialcode Required
properties.description: Is dialcode generation required or not

properties.title: Collaborator lock key
properties.description: lock key id given by collaborator

properties.title: Assets
properties.description: R1.15-List of Asset ids used in ecml content

properties.title: Schema Version
properties.description: Schema version of the content with which it is created or updated

properties.title: Drive Url
properties.description: This Url has to be migrated

properties.title: leafNodes
properties.description: Unique leafNodes attached to collection mimeTypes

properties.title: Collection Unit Identifier
properties.description: Collection Unit Identifier for which this resource going to link.

properties.title: Question - Categories
properties.description: The categories of questions included in content.

inRelations.title: collections
inRelations.description: Which all collections is this content part of

outRelations.title: questions
outRelations.description: Assessment items associated with this content

outRelations.title: itemSets
outRelations.description: Item Sets associated with this content

outRelations.title: methods
outRelations.description: Teaching methods used in this content

outRelations.title: usesContent
outRelations.description: Screenshots and other media (assets) used by this content

outRelations.title: children
outRelations.description: Child content items (in sorted order) in case of collections like Textbooks
